title: Radiant 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath in Lincoln Park, Available: 9/5/2022
posting_body: Astounding Lincoln Park two bedroom, two bathroom features Lake views, central air, gas forced air heating, hardwood floors, new and beautiful granite countertops and stainless appliances, new cabinetry, new bath, ample closet space, large private balcony, on-site laundry, bike storage, fitness center with Cybex and Cardio Equipment, free weights, amazing rooftop deck with stunning skyline views, doorman, parking available!
